###################################
        FeraLab GB Firmware        
###################################


        >>> ROM - v41.2 <<<
- Changed to OpenDNS nameservers
- Tuned LMK params
- Changed to MDP composer
- Forced Dalvik optimization
- Tuned Dalvik VM params
- Removed Google services
- Base apps updated
- UI animations tune-up
- Zram increased to 128Mb & tuned
- FDE tune-up
- Kernel I/O tune-up
- Min CPU freq. set to 576Mhz
- Battery-saving tweaks
- misc..


        >>> ROM - v41 <<<
- UTC fix
- Animated statusbar elements
- Animated logo in settings
- SELinux status
- Partition info menu
- Updated Viper4Android
- Updated Gallery
- Updates SuperSU
- Updated system icons
- Android L-like framework tune-up
- New Xperia animations
- Removed battery bar
- Removed pie control
- Installer script fixes
- Android Lollipop system animations
- Dalvik VM tune-up
- Surfaceflinger tune-up
- SpareParts removed
- GPS config update
- Network location fixes
- System sw & hw rules fix
- Statusbar text color fix
- Build.prop tune-up
- DRM fixed
- New wallpaper
- Added market
- Updated Walkman player
- Ported ICS lockscreen (modified)
- System fonts tune-up
- Android 4.2 GLES framework API
- JellyBean platlogo
- Updated Adblocker (2x faster)
- OMX codecs fix
- Video recorder fixed
- Alarm fixed
- ICS camera
- FDE updated & improved
- misc...

        >>> Kernel - v29 <<<
- 650MB on /data partition (UB)
- GPIO time fixes
- CPU undervolt
- Modem undervolt
- SELinux support
- MTD tune-up
- KSM tune-up
- VM tune-up
- Touchscreen sensivity tune-up
- Ramdisk binaries updated
- MDP speed-up
- Cgroups extended support
- Startup services cleanup
- Devices permissions fix
- Disabled low battery shutdown
- Smartass cpu gov. tuned
- Entropy fix
- misc..



More on feralab.org
